concept.title: Concept Topics
concept.shortdesc: Concept topics help users understand what something is, how it works, and why itâ€™s relevant.

section.p: Concept topics are used to explain things such as objects and functions, models and structures, or processes and workflows. Essentially they help readers understand a subject before diving into tasks or more granular information.

section.title: User Intent
section.p: "I need to understand this before I can do anything with it."

ul.li:
or

: Used to structure and present explanatory content.
Start with a clear definition or high-level overview.
Use analogies or examples to clarify complex concepts.
Organize content from general to specific.
Avoid embedding task steps in concept topics; instead, provide related links to separate task topics.
